records.where_clear: Hotel room in an unspecified location related to Poseidon Sea operation.
records.uncertainty_note: Specific location redacted, only 'hotel room' and operational area mentioned.
records.context_note: An HP officer deployed under a Frontex co-financed operation was found dead in his hotel room, suspected to be from a heart attack.
records.evidence_quote: The HP officer who was working as a [redacted] (deployment co-financed by Frontex) in [redacted] has been found dead in his hotel room. Supposedly, the officer has died from heart attack.

records.where_clear: New extension area of a camp (East part, out of security perimeter) in an unspecified location related to Poseidon Sea operation.
records.location_text_raw: vicinity of [redacted] (in the new extension area of the camp, East part out of the security perimeter)
records.uncertainty_note: Specific camp location redacted, only 'new extension area of the camp' mentioned.
records.context_note: Migrants engaged in fights within the new extension area of a camp, resulting in at least two possible injuries (TBC). No Frontex staff were involved.
records.evidence_quote: In the morning hours, some migrants started fighting with each other in the vicinity of [redacted] (in the new extension area of the camp, East part out of the security perimeter). At least two migrants have been injured (TBC).

records.where_clear: An unspecified accommodation facility related to Poseidon Sea operation.
records.context_note: A migrant attempted suicide by cutting veins in an accommodation facility. The migrant was taken to hospital with non-life-threatening injuries and had a history of suicide attempts.
records.evidence_quote: migrant accommodated in [redacted] tried to commit suicide by cutting veins. [redacted] was taken to hospital but injuries are not life threatening.

records.where_clear: EASO area within an unspecified facility related to Poseidon Sea operation.
records.context_note: A group of 40-50 Arabic and Kurdish migrants protested at an EASO area due to slow asylum procedures. The situation remained calm, and no Frontex staff were involved. The protest concluded after a meeting with officials.
records.evidence_quote: Arabic and Kurdish migrants (group around 40-50 persons) have started a protest at the EASO area in [redacted] because of slow asylum procedure.

records.where_clear: Within a RIC (Reception and Identification Centre) in an unspecified location related to Poseidon Sea operation.
records.context_note: Tensions between Iraqi and Kurdish migrants in a RIC resulted in 2 slightly injured migrants and damaged items. HP handled the situation, and no Frontex staff were involved.
records.evidence_quote: There has been tension between Iraqi and Kurdish migrants which occurred on 20 October 2017 between [redacted] in the RIC [redacted]. HP handled the situation, 2 migrants were slightly injured.
